project_short_description: A cookiecutter template with ARC recommendations.
funder: JBFC: The Joe Bloggs Funding Council

__prompts__.author_email: Email address for package author - will be publicly accessible
__prompts__.project_name: Name for project - may contain spaces
__prompts__.project_slug: 'Slugified' project name for use in URLs - recommended to be all lower case with hyphens as word separator
__prompts__.package_name: Name for Python package - recommended to be all lowercase with underscores as word separator
__prompts__.project_short_description: Short description of the project and package
__prompts__.initialise_git_repository: Initialise generated package directory as a Git repository
__prompts__.deploy_docs_to_github_pages: Enable automatically deploying HTML documentation to GitHub Pages website on pushes to main
__prompts__.github_username: GitHub user or organization which will be owner of repository if deploying to GitHub
__prompts__.min_python_version: Minimum Python version supported by package
__prompts__.max_python_version: Maximum Python version supported by package
__prompts__.license: Which open-source license to release package under
__prompts__.funder: Any organisation(s) to acknowledge for contibruting to funding of package development
